definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: The raid was conducted with U. S. military personnel assaulting on two helicopters.
sentences.chinese: 實施襲擊的是兩駕直升機上的美國軍方人員。

sentences.english: Helicopters and other VTOL aircraft normally have an avoidance curve.
sentences.chinese: 直升機和其他垂直起降飛機通常避免曲線。

sentences.english: Apologies for the blizzard of figures, but they are important.
sentences.chinese: 提起這森冷的數字就令人歉然，但直升機真的很重要。

sentences.english: They flew into Mogadishu in Black Hawk helicopters in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 他們在大白天乘坐黑鷹直升機飛入了摩加迪沙。

sentences.english: Four US copters have gone down in Iraq in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 近幾周來，已經有四架美軍直升機在伊拉克墜落。

sentences.english: Three helipads are on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 大廈頂部有三個直升機停機坪。

sentences.english: My mum sent the helicopter back to Genting Highlands.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽把那架直升機送回雲頂高原。

sentences.english: Important Role of Medical Helicopter in Rescue for Astronaut in the Landing Place .
sentences.chinese: 醫療救護直升機在航天員醫療保障中所起的重要作用。

sentences.english: Pay the hundred or whatever kuai a year for the helicopter insurance.
sentences.chinese: 每年花個幾百塊錢，買個直升機保險。

sentences.english: Aviation Agency said the helicopter landed for refueling in the crash.
sentences.chinese: 航空署說，直升機是在準備降落加油時墜毀的。

sentences.english: You are unable to lock-on to smaller helicopters, such as Little Birds.
sentences.chinese: 你不能鎖定小型直升機，比如小鳥。

sentences.english: This helicopter is used by the flight group “Berkuts” (golden eagles) that performs difficult flights on military helicopters.
sentences.chinese: “金雕”飛行隊用這架直升機做高難度飛行表演。

sentences.english: This paper treats the several key technical problems on attack helicopter air-combat.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了武裝直升機空戰的幾個關鍵技術問題。

sentences.english: Did you know that one company is making external airbags for helicopters and rotorcraft ?
sentences.chinese: 你可知道，一個公司對外氣袋直升機和旋翼？

sentences.english: Approval of construction of the heliport to go through and above the provincial level government, and military.
sentences.chinese: 修建直升機場的審批要經過省級以上政府，以及軍方。

sentences.english: The CTU chopper lands to pick up Teri and Kim.
sentences.chinese: 反恐組派來的直升機降落，來接載泰瑞和金姆。

definition: car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
